::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus listened to the briefing that Hydras was providing.

Jhiaxus: What forms did this Maximal take? Alternate modes I mean.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                               OOC to Robo: regarding that my internet is acting weird again I'll  
 post all  what I rember of Rudrak olds char. in order to do this 
 short
 
 Hydras:
 
 "This is a preliminar info about the girl's body guard" said Hydras 
 while he downloaded some info from the main comnputer. "His main 
 goal in life was protect her, as far my internal segurity sistems 
 picked up she was importat but he dint remember why, that's othe 
 reason that I want capture her..."
 
 Hydras continue searching more info about this forgotten warrior
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > 
 > Jhiaxus typed controls, returning the signal to Scorponok.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: This is Lord Jhiaxus, Co-Commander of the Generation 2 
 Decepticon Empire. I am transmitting the coordinates to my present 
 location. You may come here but be sure to remain undetected.
 > 
 > ::Scorponok/Zarak::
 > 
 > Zarak receives the coordinates and without a reply heads for 
 Hydras' base.
 > 
 > Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:                                  
 > hYDRAS:
 >   
 >  "Permition granted" said the male, altough his ego  was pleaced 
 that Jhiaxus asked permition he remembered that Jhiaxus  belonged to 
 the treacherous Starscream faction
 >   
 >   
 >     ----- Original Message ----- 
 >    From:    Richard    Allen 
 >    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 >    Sent: Monday, October 22, 2007 10:55    AM
 >    Subject: Generation 2
 >    
 > 
 >       ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > 
 > While with Hydras at the Predacon base, Jhiaxus    began to 
 receive the signal from Scorponok. At first he couldn't make it    
 out.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: I'm receiveing some kind of old Decepticon signal. 
 It's    coming through the base systems.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus takes position at the nearest    communication console and 
 starts typing commands in.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: I think    it's the other G2 we picked up earlier. He 
 must be trying to contact me. If I    can decode the signal I can 
 order him to come here through channels that only    he and I can 
 get to. We could use more numbers to our cause. Permission to    
 invite a friend, Hydras?
 >
